alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Jackson; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 18 at 3:41AM CST until January 19 at 4:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...All of coastal Mississippi, coastal southeast Louisiana, and metro New Orleans including portions of the Northshore. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM this morning to 4 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
